item.title: Games
item.description: Currently developing a unique, diverse, multi-concept 2D Flutter game. Your browser does not support HTML5 video. Single Player Gathering Feature Your browser does not support HTML5 video. Your browser does not support HTML5 video. Multiplayer Fighting Feature Please note that this game is currently under development and is not available to download or play.

item.title: Simply Notes
item.description: Xi Simply Notes is an unusual application that lets you create text, image, and map notes. Copy, share, or delete the notes easily with one swipe. You can swipe right to copy, swipe right further to share, and swipe left to delete the notes. Your notes are private and inaccessible by other applications unless you share them. Different Swipe Functions You can select an image or take a photograph to save as an image note.

item.title: Simply Weather
item.description: Xi Simply Weather is an adjustable and swipeable widget application that aims to provide you with detailed weather information through its widgets. Using this widget, you can continuously observe weather data by looking at the home screen of your phone. You can observe the following weather data through the widgets: current temperature how the temperature feels like high and low-temperature estimations cloudiness wind speed probability of precipitation ultraviolet index of sunlight visibility humidity pressure rain volume snow volume Settings and Details View You can either expand the widgets or swipe them down to see more weather data.
